name: List
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Dataset
List
description: Dataset::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Dataset
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Dataset
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: etag
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Dataset
List#etag
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: etag=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Dataset
List#etag=
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Dataset
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of datasets.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

datasets = bigquery.datasets
if datasets.next?
  next_datasets = datasets.next
end

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

datasets = bigquery.datasets
if datasets.next?
  next_datasets = datasets.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Dataset
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all datasets by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each dataset, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all datasets are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each result by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

bigquery.datasets.all do |dataset|
  puts dataset.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

all_names = bigquery.datasets.all.map do |dataset|
  dataset.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

bigquery.datasets.all(request_limit: 10) do |dataset|
  puts dataset.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to make
to load all datasets. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each dataset.
